posts.post_title: (2) SGC A - 1887 N284 Gold Coin - Jim Hart and Tom Morrissy
posts.post_content:
Asking $400 shipped on each or both for $700, Paypal F&F. These dont sell very often so I'm a bit perplexed with how to price them, I cant remember but pretty sure these are under 10 total pop for SGC and PSA.

I've sold here many times! :)
